name: Manish Kumar
description: With over 15 years of experience, including 9 years in the financial services sector, I specialize in leading high-performing teams of 50+ to deliver exceptional results.

name: Manish K. Yadav
description: With over 11 years of experience in building and scaling apps for major consumer companies, I excel in tackling complex challenges, exploring new domains, and creating adaptable systems.

name: Vik Angelo
description: Results-oriented Marketing and Sales Ad-Tech Professional with 16+ years driving successful mobile and digital campaigns. Proven track record of managing $55 million in ad revenue across 100+ campaigns. Skilled in leveraging data-driven insights and strategic partnerships to maximize performance.

name: Alok Baid
description: Alok is a seasoned fintech product manager with 9+ years of experience in open banking, remittances, and payments. Previously leading teams at Airbase, Airtel and MobiKwik.

name: Deepak Kumar
description: Seasoned professional with extensive experience in handling operational activities. He specializes in project management, vendor management, client relationship management, sales support, and resource management.
